definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:the_purge</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5000</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">time set night</field></block></value><next><block type="block_inv_remove_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">QUE COMIENCE LA PURGA</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
